name: Adventure
desc: This trait is used by PECS to denote backgrounds that are specific to their respective adventures and may contain spoilers for players of those adventures.

name: Ancestry
desc: This trait is used by PECS to denote an ancestry feat that can be taken by any ancestry.

name: Familiar Ability
desc: This trait is used by PECS to denote a familiar ability from the list of familiar abilities.

name: Master Ability
desc: This trait is used by PECS to denote a familiar ability from the list of master abilities.

name: Regional
desc: This trait is used by PECS to denote a background that is specific to a certain region on Golarion.
